CustomField.formula: CASE( LEFT( CallDate__c , 1) , "R", 2018+ VALUE(MID(CallDate__c , 2, FIND("/", CallDate__c )-2)) , "H", 1989+ VALUE(MID(CallDate__c , 2, FIND("/", CallDate__c )-2)) ,"S", 1925+ VALUE(MID(CallDate__c , 2, FIND("/", CallDate__c )-2)) ,"T", 1911+ VALUE(MID(CallDate__c , 2, FIND("/", CallDate__c )-2)) ,null)
CustomField.label: 元号を数値に
